note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: 'Abschrift versandt' [Copy sent].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. phil. & med. Ferdinand Baron von Müller Mr.F.D.H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: d. Z. Stiftsrath des Freien Deutschen Hoschstiftes

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Zuschrift und Sendung vom (Eing. 26/XI) d. J.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: mit welcher Sie die Güte hatten, und abermals durch die Mittheilung Ihres Schrift On the Advancement of the Natural Sciences through Ministers of the Christian Church

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr. phil. & med. Ferdinand Baron von Mueller Mr.F.D.H
Meister des Freies Deutsches Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Frankfurt on Main, 20 Christ-month
i.e. Decembe r.
1878

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment (received 26 November) this year with which you had the goodness to gratify us through the communication of your paper On the Advancement of the Natural Sciences through Ministers of the Christian Church
B77.13.05. we thank you kindly and request support from your further kindly goodwill for our academy.
